item.title: Kanye West Documentary Filmmaker Says ‘In Whose Name?’ Is About Fame, Not Breakdowns
item.description: Nico Ballesteros started trailing the mogul while he was still a teenager. The 3,000 hours of footage he captured for the doc ‘In Whose Name?’ covers West’s highs, lows and antisemitic rants.
